text: belee hai a mee gii duu. Digaula ga helekai, “Uzziah! Goe o mogobuna ai bolo e dudu nia ‘incense’ ang gi Dimaadua. Digau hai mee dabu hua ala go nia hagadili o Aaron la ne hagadabu e hai tegau deenei. Ulu mai gi daha mo di gowaa dabu deenei. Goe gu hagahuaidu Yihowah God26.18 Di ingoo o God deenei le e hai dono hadinga bolo “Yihowah di God dela e noho i baahi ana daangada”, ono hagahumalia gu daa gi daha mo goe.”
